core:messageResource.core:message: Price Override
An application error has occurred. Please contact your administrator.
Price Override
No Items are available to override. Press OK to continue.
Price Override Cancelled. Press OK to continue.
Price Override of this item is not allowed. Press OK to continue.
The item entered was not found or cannot be overridden.
The item entered has already been overridden.
The price entered is invalid. Please try again.
The price entered is too low. The lowest allowed price for this item is its net value which after all savings is {%=format:formatCurrency(lowestPrice)}. Press OK to continue.
The price entered is too high. The highest allowed price for this item is its net value which after all savings is {%=format:formatCurrency(highestPrice)}. Press OK to continue.
Please enter price override reference.
The reference entered is invalid. Please try again.
No appropriate Price Override reason codes are available.
Changes to receipt return value is not allowed. Press OK to continue.
Please enter the price override explanation.
Please enter the price override explanation.
Explanation
Please select a price override reason and press the OK button.
The Price Override does not allowed to be applied on item discounted items.
Price Override Item
The user can price override items
Price Override Allowed
Item discounts are allowed
Authorises Price Override
The user can authorise price overrides
Skip Price Override Cancel Notification
Price override cancel notifications will not be shown for this user
Force Witness On Price Override
Force witness capture on price override flow
